about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I am Gábor Tóth, the creator and owner of TG Art Tattoo. I have been in the industry since 2018, but I only opened my own tattoo studio in Zalaegerszeg in 2023.

Initially, I tried to learn and practice while working, but over time it became unsustainable, and I started building my own business. Since then, I have been putting much more effort into always being better and improving continuously so that I can create quality tattoos for you every day. In the past few years, I have achieved several successes, but I never feel like I can stop; I am always looking for new goals and challenges.

Over the years, I have tried myself in several styles, but it was late that it really started to become clear what my direction is. I mostly move in the sketch and fineline line, within which I especially like to create in horror, animal, and plant-themed patterns, but I also like to spread my wings in the world of realism.

For me, my clients are the most important, and I want to provide them with the best, so I try to be up to par in several styles. I believe that every tattoo has meaning and a story, so I am indescribably grateful for every person who chooses me because without them, I wouldn't be where I am! For me, this whole thing is not just work but also passion!

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.description: What my clients say about me – their satisfaction is the greatest recognition.

1.text: I wholeheartedly recommend Gábor to everyone. I wish everyone could have a first tattoo experience like this. The atmosphere was great, very pleasant and tasteful environment. Helpful and friendly. I don't regret choosing him for a second, and I'll definitely go to him for my future tattoos too.

2.text: The tattoo artist is very talented and creative. I have 2 tattoos from him so far and both are perfect, meticulous work. He is also very fair, cool, and patient. I can't wait to get another tattoo from him!

3.text: I'm very satisfied. He's approachable and friendly, so the sessions always pass in a good mood. He's precise and pays attention to every little detail, which shows in the finished tattoo. I wholeheartedly recommend him to everyone who wants quality work!
